meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring between regions.
meanings.sent1: The interregional trade agreement benefited multiple areas.
meanings.sent2: The interregional bus service connected the neighboring towns.
meanings.sent3: The interregional picnic brought together people from various places.
meanings.sent4: Her interregional mindset allowed her to understand diverse cultures.
meanings.sent5: The interregional map highlighted the different geographical zones.

meanings.sent1: The interregional highway linked the cities on the outskirts.
meanings.sent2: The interregional flights made travel between states easier.
meanings.sent3: The interregional potluck showcased dishes from various locations.
meanings.sent4: His interregional network spanned across multiple countries.
meanings.sent5: The interregional bridge symbolized unity between distant areas.
